homeIndex.name: Food
homeIndex.description: Get nutritional information on more than 8,700 foods. It takes the analysis, compilation and reporting of nutrient and food component data to a new level.

homeIndex.name: Dishes
homeIndex.description: Visualize the available dishes, their preparation, ingredients and nutritional data. Do you want to know the nutritional data from one of your dishes? Create it and you can have all the nutritional information available to download it.

homeIndex.name: Menus
homeIndex.description: Learn about the menus available, the dishes they make, their ingredients and nutritional information. Add your own menus and download the information of any dish on the list.

homeIndex.name: Planning
homeIndex.description: Plan the menus for the next days, weeks or months. You will have all the plans visible and with the total nutritional data ready to download.

homeIndex.name: Recommendations
homeIndex.description: Check the nutritional standards that nutritionists have included in the application and know what the healthy limits of eating are.

homeIndex.name: Evaluations
homeIndex.description: Check if a dish, menu or plan meets the minimum and maximum nutritional values of a recommendation.

register.title: User Registration
register.texto: Register in the application by completing the form with your personal data.

login.title: Log in
login.texto: Log in using your username and password associated with this application.
login.pregunta: Do not you have an account?

dishIndex.name: Show dishes
dishIndex.description: Look at the dishes, their ingredients and the nutritional data of each of them.

dishIndex.name: Add dishes
dishIndex.description: Create your own dishes, using the available ingredients, through a simple form.

dishIndex.name: Add dishes from a JSON file
dishIndex.description: Create your own dishes, using the available ingredients, through a JSON file with the data.

menuIndex.name: Show menus
menuIndex.description: Look at the menus, the dishes that make it up and the nutritional data of each one of them.

menuIndex.name: Add menus
menuIndex.description: Create your own menus, using the available dishes, through a simple form.

menuIndex.name: Add menus from a JSON file
menuIndex.description: Create your own menus, using the available dishes, through a JSON file with the data.

planificationIndex.name: Show planifications
planificationIndex.description: View the plans, the menus for each day and the nutritional data of each plan.

planificationIndex.name: Add planifications
planificationIndex.description: Create your own plannings, using the available menus, through a simple form.

planificationIndex.name: Add planifications from a JSON file
planificationIndex.description: Create your own plannings, using the available menus, through a JSON file with the data.

recommendationIndex.name: Show recommendations
recommendationIndex.description: View the nutritional recommendations provided by nutritionists.

recommendationIndex.name: Add recommendations
recommendationIndex.description: Being a nutritionist, you can create your own recommendations through a simple form.

recommendationIndex.name: Add recommendations from a JSON file
recommendationIndex.description: Being a nutritionist, create your own recommendations through a JSON file with the data.

evaluationIndex.name: Show evaluations
evaluationIndex.description: Displays the results of evaluations of dishes, menus and plans.

evaluationIndex.name: Make evaluations
evaluationIndex.description: Create your own plans, using the dishes, menus and plans available, through a simple form.

foodIndex.name: Show food
foodIndex.description: View the nutritional data of more than 8700 foods.

home.title: Jilorio
home.description: Jilorio is a web application created in order to evaluate the quality of dishes, menus and planning based on dietary recommendations.

dish.title: Dishes
dish.description: From Dishes, you can access each of them and know their ingredients and nutritional values. If you are missing a dish, do not hesitate to include them from a form or from the upload of a JSON file.

menu.title: Menus
menu.description: From Menus, you can access each of them and learn about their dishes and nutritional values. If you are missing a menu, don't hesitate to include them from a form or from the upload of a JSON file.

planification.title: Planning
planification.description: From Planning, you can access each of them to know the menus that make it up and the total nutritional values. You can create your own schedules from a form or from the upload of a JSON file.

recommendation.title: Recommendations
recommendation.description: From Recommendations, you can view the nutritional standards of each of them. If you are a nutritionist, you can add your own recommendations from a form or with the upload of a JSON file.

evaluation.title: Evaluations
evaluation.description: From Evaluations, you can check if a dish, menu or planning has been adjusted to the minimum and maximum values of a recommendation. To create an evaluation, you only have to indicate the candidate to evaluate and the recommendation to use.

food.title: Food
food.description: From Food, you can access the nutritional data of each of the foods.

errors.formatInc: The file does not respect the usage example.
errors.dishName: It could not find a name for the dish.
errors.dishDescription: No description found for the dish.
errors.dishRecipe: The recipe URL is not correct.
errors.dishImage: The image URL is not correct.
errors.dishIngredient: You must enter at least one ingredient.
errors.amountNotFound: The amount for the food has not been defined
errors.dishAmount2: must be expressed with numerical data.
errors.dishUnitMeasure: The unit of measurement has not been defined for the quantity of the food
errors.dishUnitMeasure1: The unit of measure for the amount of food
errors.dishUnitMeasure2: must be expressed as a data in 'g' for grams or 'ml' for milliliters.
errors.dishNdbno2: must be expressed with a character string.

errors.difDishName2: ' that identifies the dish has not been used before. There can be no dishes with the same names.
errors.difDishName3: Check if the name that identifies the dish has not been used before. There can be no dishes with the same names.
errors.saveError: Failed to save dish in database.
errors.dishNotExist: Error, the plate could not be removed
errors.menuNotExist: Error, the menu could not be removed
errors.menuName: No name found for menu or menus.
errors.menuDescription: No description found for menu or menus.
errors.menuDishes: You must enter at least one menu.
errors.difMenuName2: ' that identifies the menu has not been used before. There cannot be menus with the same names.
errors.planTitle: The planning name cannot be empty and must consist of a character string.
errors.planDesc: The description cannot be empty and must consist of a character string.
errors.planDays: The number of days for planning could not be found.
errors.numberDays: The number of days must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.minDays: The minimum number of days must be 1.
errors.menuLength: The number of days does not coincide with the days on which the menus are organized.
errors.difPlanName2: 'which identifies the planning has not been used before. There cannot be menus with the same names.
errors.recRemoveError: Error, the recommendation could not be removed.
errors.enerComp: The minimum amount of energy cannot be greater than the maximum amount of energy.
errors.lipidComp: The minimum amount of lipids cannot be greater than the maximum amount of lipids.
errors.protComp: The minimum amount of protein cannot be greater than the maximum amount of proteins.
errors.carbComp: The minimum amount of carbohydrates cannot be greater than the maximum amount of carbohydrates.
errors.recNotFound: You have not entered any recommendations.
errors.recTitleString: The name of the recommendation cannot be empty and must consist of a character string.
errors.recDescString: The description cannot be empty and must consist of a character string.
errors.recEdad: The age for the recommendation has not been found.
errors.recEdadString: The age cannot be empty and must consist of a character string.
errors.recEnergyMax: The energyMax number for the recommendation was not found.
errors.recEnergyMaxNumber: The energyMax number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recEnergyMin: The energyMin number for the recommendation was not found.
errors.recEnergyMinNumber: The energyMin number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recCompEnergyMinMax: The energyMin cannot be less than the energyMax.
errors.recLipidMax: The number of lipidsMax for the recommendation was not found.
errors.recLipidMaxNumber: The lipidsMax number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recLipidMaxMin: The minimum of lipidsMax must be 1.
errors.recLipidMin: The number of lipidsMin for recommendation has not been found.
errors.recLipidMinNumber: The number of lipidsMin must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recLipidMinMin: The minimum of lipidsMin must be 1.
errors.recCompLipidMinMax: The lipidsMin cannot be less than the lipidsMax.
errors.recProtMax: ProteinMax number not found for recommendation.
errors.recProtMaxNumber: The proteinMax number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recProtMin: ProteinMin number not found for recommendation.
errors.recProtMinNumber: The proteinMin number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recCompProtMinMax: ProteinMin cannot be less than proteinMax.
errors.recCarboMax: No carbohydrtMax number found for recommendation.
errors.recCarboMaxNumber: The carbohydrtMax number must be entered with a numeric character.
errors.recCarboMin: The carbohydrtMin number has not been found for the recommendation.
